page.shortlink: grid properties advanced other properties property
page.description: Define other properties for the Grid Component.
page.discussion: "Other properties" are properties that can be defined for a component but are not listed in any builder interface. The following properties can be added to the Grid Component in the *[ui:Other properties]* setting:

section.title: tmpl.timer

description.p: With this flag turned on, the Grid displays timing information for how long various parts of the Grid execution are taking. This is useful for debugging a slow component.

section.important: *[ui:tmpl.timer]* should be turned *[off]* in a production environment.

description.p: The timing information is automatically added to the page. It is typically shown below the Grid Component:

section.title: tmpl.showErrorDetail

description.p: Displays detailed information for errors when performing a query against the Grid component's data source. Useful for debugging purposes.

section.important: *[ui:tmpl.showErrorDetail]* should be turned *[off]* in a production environment.

description.p: If there is an error in the SQL query used to populate the Grid, you may see the following message:
